title: @Riot I offer up a beautiful Illustration in turn for a bit of assistance.
body:
I am a mere 6 RP short of a long awaited goal of my first and favorite Rammus skin, Ninja Rammus. Might this delightfully humble image be worthy of 6 RP to help a brother out?

https://ibb.co/bBxTvv [IMG]

Edit: Why didn't that become an Image?

replies.body:
Oh snap, that must really suck to only be like 6 RP away from Ninja Rammus skin! Since you were able to capture just how sneaky he can be sometimes, I went ahead and gave you that little bump you needed ^_^! Keep in mind this is something we typically only do once, so we may not be able to give you another bump like this in the future.


P.S. That image didn't load because you didn't have the .jpg/.png. If you right-click on the image and click copy image location, it should work right the next time!
